page.title: 05Schoolboy's Saturday
page.content: Its a nice summer Saturday in July, its haymaking time,&the grass is ready to be baled.Mum gets me up at 7am when I'm only half awake.I get dressed & have breakfast.At 8am I feed my goats, ducks,rabbit & guinea_pigs.I then go with Dad to bale the hay.The baler is put onto the tractor,the bale_sledge onto the baler & then we start baling. We finish at 1pm,time for dinner! After dinner I play until Dad comes out,then we go to collect the bales. Dad puts the bales on the trailer while I stack them. Its time for tea when we finish.After tea I shut up the animals,then watch T.V. until 11pm when I go to bed.
